website_summaries.verdict: The major advantage of this brand is that it is available in several sizes for a variety of door opening widths.
pros: Comes in 11 width and height options to find a good fit for your door opening
Made to stand up to wind
Company stands behind the product with good customer service
cons: Sometimes bigger dogs can cause damage to this product, but smaller animals and children seem to do well with it

customer_reviews.title: This was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money. It would not close together at the bottom, even as I’ve adjusted the top part a few times. The velcro does not hold well either. *UPDATE 6/15: The company has reached out to me several times to try and resolve the problem. When nothing worked they offered to send a replacement product in a different size as a last resort to solve the issue. Their commitment to their customers have impressed me. They have earned my trust as a customer. I will do another update on the product as soon as I see how the replacement works out. Either way, their customer service have exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: DCNelson722

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats, and one has figured out how to go through the screen (as if ducking under it), but the magnets are too strong for the other to bother with, especially since she has another escape hatch. So far, neither has used it for scratching, and other animals that had come in before are no longer coming in. I am impressed with the materials and the closure all the way down and expect it will last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: OJDart

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with metal framed doors
customer_reviews.text: The weight of the magnets is too much for the Velcro, always pulling the top center of the screen down causing the magnets not to meet. May work with a wood frame using the tacks but absolutely a waste of money if you have a metal framed door and want to use the Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Eric and Leia

customer_reviews.title: NOT 36 inches. It gets wider every time I buy it. Currently 38 inches wide
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. The first one I bought from this same seller was a perfect fit. The dogs destroyed it after 6+ months, so I purchased another one. It was about an inch too wide that time, much to my surprise. It still kinda fit and did its job, so I left it. Third time it is a FULL TWO INCHES too wide. Check the pictures. It's not even close to the advertised 36" width. Will be returning and finding a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy screen door.
customer_reviews.text: 8/24/20 I would’ve given it 5 stars but I have one gap in the door that doesn’t want to close. Screen door for my cargo trailer. Fit was good. Easy to install. The Velcro was good and sticky I don’t think it will fall off. In the video you can see some gaps in the center I am hopeful that will seal up after being used for awhile. Tho in that one area the magnets don’t seem as strong as the others. I will update after I use this for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: ungalor

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: My wife saw one of these at a house we toured and decided she wanted one on our new house. We like the convenience of leaving the door open during cool weather without bugs entering the house. I cook on the patio all the time and we did not want the inconvenience of opening and closing a screen door while grilling. My door is larger than standard and I bought the 36" by 98". It fit perfectly and opens and closes well. The dog learned how to use it quickly. That's her looking out at me.
customer_reviews.author: D. Herrick

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile, the screen cracks if you grab it to open
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our front door. Installation was fine, but the screen material is extremely fragile. Even a gentle pinch of the material in order to grab it and open it results in broken mesh, and the crack then propagates for several inches. We have tried to hot glue gun it back together but now it is ugly and the company won't let us return it. Don't buy this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: Not the correct size
customer_reviews.text: I measured the door as suggested by the seller on Amazon. We purchased the 36x96 however the actual size of the screen is 37 3/4 inches wide which is approximately 1 inch too wide. We do not want to attach the adhesive to the glass door. We can manipulate it but it is not designed as described.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn A.

customer_reviews.title: STIFFFFFF!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this gets such high ratings but I ordered a different one as soon as I got this one out of the bag. It is stiff like regular screening which makes it difficult for the dogs to manage, I even dragged it because it is so stiff. I really had to rub back and forth several times to be sure the velcro was secure. Additionally, there are not enough magnets. I have to pull it together each time. I think Amazon just needs to move some not so great product and made this their choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic screen has been wonderful to cover our fire escape door. We were in dire need of fresh air and this allows us to create a crosswind through our apartment so our dogs don't have to suffer with us. As luck would have it, I also appear to have overcome my fear of heights while installing it. Cheaper than a therapist folks. Almost forgot, if you, your dogs, or your clothes, get stuck on the two velcro securing strips, you can cut the round end off and place it over the catch (see pic). No more sticking to the screen.
customer_reviews.author: River Stix

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work on my French door opening
customer_reviews.text: Gave one star because it didn't work for me We have a French patio door that leads to a deck and i was planning to use this screen there Maybe its because i didn't read and looked thoroughly at the specific info but this screen does NOT WORK ON A FRENCH DOOR OPENING ( one side when its opened) I returned it Got my money back Quality seems good transaction was smooth But its of no use for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Product Description
customer_reviews.text: I placed an order for a 32 inch screen, but when it arrived, it was closer to 34 inches. The two extra inches prohibit the screen from installing properly on my door frame. I'm planning to purchase the 30 inch screen door and see if that's closer to 32 inches. The inaccurate product description is costing me time and effort needed to return the product, as well as causing delays to other projects around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Good screens
customer_reviews.text: Good screen but it arrives folded and the fold marks are stuck on there. I wish the sticky velcro was made with command hook glue that removed with no damage. I will have to repaint when I move out of this rental but the screen is good enough. I also wish it had an extra piece on the bottom so it touched the floor and no crawly bugs could sneak under it. I got two sets of of the 36x80 screens
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: size 3 inches narrower than advertized. Also could tell from packaging it had been returned many times before!
customer_reviews.author: DJH

customer_reviews.title: Super durable and strong!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my last one after careful reading and research, I am glad I came to this one because the product is made way better. This screen is made with fiberglass and not plastic filament like other which makes a difference when you have sevice dogs that like to knock and don't understand that it will hurt the door. In my photo above you can see the comparison of the two materials. The MAGZO is the top metal looking one, where my old one was supposed to be fiberglass but it was plastic junk! MAGZO is obviously the way to go....I will update after my three huge dogs use for a month lol...
customer_reviews.author: Potter

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen for our unique situation
customer_reviews.text: We needed a way to have a screen to our indoor door that leads to our Bilco door. We looked into options - many not feasible due to the interior door opens in and then you have cement stairs. So we tried this this product Magzo Magnetic Screen Door and so far really nice. Took 2 of us about 10 minutes with taking measurements and we are pleased with the results. Tape adheres we’ll do we did not tack it yet. Now the bugs cannot get in when the outside Bilco door is open along with the interior door. Nice product- I’ll update when the weather changes but I can recommend it now!
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Durable and better closure
customer_reviews.text: Magnetic strip the full length of the opening makes for more secure closure. Do not follow the directions for installing. If you attach it to the doorframe any lower than about three feet from the floor, it will have trouble opening. I used a bit of elastic cord on the bottom outside corners to keep it "trimmed" to the doorframe when closed. Fiberglass makes it MUCH more durable than the competitive product, which tends to get ragged relatively early.
customer_reviews.author: William MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This screen door is better than others. My cousin had a different brand that wasn’t of great quality. His was lightweight and only had a couple magnets down the middle. This particular one is perfect! Is heavy (but not too heavy), and there is a magnetic strip that goes down the entire middle so that it closes evenly. It seems very durable. It was very easy to install. The nails provided adds extra stability to the product ad far as it staying in place. I have a horrible fly/mosquito problem and this does an amazing job of keeping them out! great value for the quality of this product. Love love this screen door.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: East to install and available for tall doors!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. I'm glad they included thumb tacks as the tape probably wouldn't hold it up long because the wood is rough in the door jam. It was easy to install to keep out flying insects for the Arizona spring. It doesn't cover the bottom of the door jam due to the way the door is so creepy crawlies like scorpions will still have easy access to the inside of the house when the door is open. We don't plan to leave it open at night so not terribly concerned. It only took a few minutes to put up and if it lasts for a couple of months till the summer heat hits I am thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: AZDaver01

customer_reviews.title: FRONT SEAM LEAVES GAPS
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old screen with this one and am not that happy with the new one! (They don't make the old one I had any longer) We are having a really bad mosquito outbreak in LA, which is why I really needed something they wouldn't be able to get in thru and this is NOT it!! It leaves small gaps in the front where it meets top to bottom!!!! If you're looking for good bug protection look for somemhing that overlaps in the front!!!
customer_reviews.author: JClay

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty pleased with it at the start, it wasn’t too hard to set up and looked good once it was up. It’s been a few months now and the adhesive is starting to give and pull the included push pins from the top row of the screen. It would also be nice if there was an included strip of extra Velcro so you could Velcro each flap of the screen open on either side of the door. Another thing to keep in mind is the magnet strip is straight down the middle and might block your doors view hole when closed if using it on a front door.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice product & easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these in different door sizes. Both arrived quickly and size measurements were exactly as ordered. The screen is a heavier gauge than your typical window screen, the velcro loop strip is well sewn onto the screen with no frayed screen or strings. The velcro hook strip came in a roll & is approx 1-2 inches longer than needed for the full length of the screen portion. The hook strip adhered to the door frame well enough that I didn't need to use the supplied tacks at this time. Install took less than 10 minutes. The screen self closes easily & fully without any issue or gaps.
customer_reviews.author: CGDot

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous deviating from the company that sold my old screen, but since the last one only lasted less than a year, decided to take a small gamble. Right off the bat, I can tell this is better quality and will last longer. If I’m wrong, I will come back and edit my review. Super easy to install. Make sure you measure your door, not the frame, when purchasing a size. I followed directions and installation was a breeze, and I am notorious for screwing up the installation of even the simplest of things!
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Better than other screens
customer_reviews.text: I had the "as seen on tv" screen last year. Although it kept flies out, it was flimsy and always got stuck on metal areas of door. I spent a little more money this year and screen has continuous velcro strip, is much sturdier and stiffer, which makes it easy to walk through and it closes quickly. The dogs can push through it. I can see this one working for years.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Barkin

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love leaving the side door open and letting my dogs come in and out. However, I don’t love when bees or worse fly in through said door. This is so useful since it literally sticks to the frame! When measuring, I measured the actual door opening, not the frame - just as manufacturer suggests. Fits perfectly! To get my dogs used to it I had to push them through it a couple times but they caught on quickly as to how it works. It does make the doorway feel slightly narrower when passing through because of the tension on the upper corners. Highly recommend though!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse-Brice

customer_reviews.title: Decent Price, Works Well So Far
customer_reviews.text: I got this for 20~ dollars. Works ok so far. I like the magnetic function, it keeps the screen close most of the time. I followed the instruction and mount the top center a bit higher than the left and right corners so that the bottom center of the screen would fall together easier. It still doesn't fall together as expected, sometime it works sometime it doesnt but for the most part it works as intended. The screen looking outside is clear and nice, the black color provide a soft shade from the harsh sunlight and the screen prevent the wind from blowing too strong into my front door.
customer_reviews.author: SJZ

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We weren’t so sure about this with how cheap it was, but honestly it is way better than I thought! We have a really tall door frame and had gotten quotes for screen doors since we would have to do custom and it was way to expensive, so we thought why not try this out and although it isn’t the prettiest screen, it works really well!!!! Opens and closes easily and most importantly for me, it keeps the bugs out when we want to leave the door open!! For sure recommend this screen!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Williams

customer_reviews.title: 100% Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace an actual sliding door. Installation wasn’t easy, a friend had to help us by making a wooden piece so that it could fit, but that was on us. Can’t tell you how strong the adhesive is as we used stub nails to keep it in place. The product look durable and the magnets work wonderfully. We haven’t had a single fly or mosquito inside the house since we installed this, and the dog is the happiest as now she can come and go as she please! Please see the video and pictures for reference. And if you are on the verge, doubt no more. But this!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: But it, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant screen. There are often three big dogs here plus one small cat and this screen holds up great when all three dogs come running in. Cat sneaks in afterwards but it’s light enough to let her through. This is my second screen. I installed the first one too low so it dragged in the ground. However, when it wore at the bottom I fixed it, used it on another screen door and purchased a new one for the door which is used more often. All in all you will not be disappointed with this screeen.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Feels strong and keeps the mosquitos/flies out.
customer_reviews.text: Being summer time mosquitos and flies are having a fun time finding their way indoors. When I put the screen up the ninja flies and mosquitos are stuck outside. The material feels strong and sturdy. The screen door shuts on its own thanks to the magnetic pull and how I set the screen up. (Follow the directions that come with it, pay close attention to angling the top and an inverted V to allow gravity to shut the screen.) So far the screen has done its job. Only time will tell how long this will last.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: First of all the adhesive used is very strong and doubt anyone would need the push pins. Unlike "others" where the magnets are contained in a plastic sleeve these are wrapped with a silicone based fabric and doubt they will ever come apart. A Friend of mine buys these for $5 sometimes but she always has to glue the magnets to the sleeves! You get what you paid for. This is a great product with much attention to details and will save me much instead of turning on my air conditioner. Ready to order a second one for my back door and create a natural draft. The weather here in New Mexico is very dry and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MONEY WASTED
customer_reviews.text: The magnets are not strong and wind opens the screen allowing flying bugs to come in. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product compared to others i have bought.
customer_reviews.text: After a few other pin up screens that didn't last a full year of weather and sun exposure. This one is doing the best of all of them. It also still closes properly. The others never seemed to snap back just right after a couple months of use. It prob will start to deteriorate over time, but it seems like it's going to hold up for more than a year compared to the others I've bought. I've shared this product with family and friends and they all have one and love it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: WhereRMyDragons

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: This screen is sturdy and durable. We live in AZ and the 115 degree heat destroys everything! We use this screen for our two dogs who are constantly in and out of the house. Saves so much time to let them be independent. The screen is easy to install and extremely durable. Fine steel mesh keeps dust and little bugs outside and not inside. Magnetic closure is so secure and instantly snaps back into place. LOVE this screen.
customer_reviews.author: Patti 415

customer_reviews.title: happy and sad
customer_reviews.text: so,,, i wanted to give this 5 stars, because it really is a quality product and the magnets work perfect. it closes by itself like a dream. Problem solved right? not... It may be just my cats and the fact that I had a 1 inch gap at the bottom and the cats could see and opening, but either way, my cats juts waltz right through the thing. like they know how it works and how to push it right open. so for my cats, it's a fail - too bad though, the product is quality and closes up tight, all on it's own - maybe i have smart cats, or persistent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and fits well
customer_reviews.text: The mesh is fiberglass and seems very sturdy and the gray color looks better than black. I bought this specifically for the length. Other screens were a little too long and got stepped on and tore. The magnets are strong. I used the Velcro that came with the screen and it fits perfectly. I added a few tacks just to make sure of the fit. I hope to be able to use this for 2 years at least. My only concern is that i will have to leave the Velcro strip on my door frame after i take it down. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Paula J. White

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to install, the adhesive isn't great so I'm putting most of my trust in the included pushpins to hold it in place. I had to use a hammer to install them. Magnets are decent and most of the time provide a good seal. Seems durable enough, let's see how long it last. My dogs can pass through pretty easy. They were more hesitant at first. Pretty pricey compared to 84" high versions.
customer_reviews.author: Tal A.

customer_reviews.title: Fine!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Measurements spot on, magnets reconnect well As I walk thru. Does bow out a little on the bottom when we have a breeze blowing but I use this on a third floor door to a roof garden on my loft so the breeze comes from downstairs and pushes out so that air flow keeps bugs from coming in. Much better than the noisy and ugly standard metal screen door I had there before. You know, the ones that close slowly until the end where they slam shut with a bang? No more!
customer_reviews.author: RichardS

customer_reviews.title: Installed on a sliding screen door for our dog!
customer_reviews.text: My dog kept chewing through our sliding patio screen door, so I grabbed one of these and installed it in the same manner as "normal" screen. Since I'd already done it twice, it wasn't that hard at all using a screen repair tool & re-using the original spline. The velcro "wind tabs" made it easy to keep it together, and it was a 20 minute 1-man job to replace the screen and we're extremely happy. I've added an additional 2 magnets to the bottom to keep it a bit more sealed, so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Brett S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up, tape the velcro and pin in place. Works exactly as the commercials on TV show. No gaps and it closes very well with the decent mangers sewn in. Make sure you measure your doorway exactly where it will hang. You have some extra length and width to deal with, so measure, then measure again. It comes in several sizes. We have an old house with wide moldings, so it was easy to get a goof fit. We have a pretty good breeze that blows all the time, but the screen does not blow open... Well worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: T. Judson

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i was looking for! go for exact size of your door!
customer_reviews.text: measured our door and this was the only brand that had the exact size we were looking for. 32x96. was not sure if i should get 32 or go a size up to make sure the was enough space to clear the velcro to the frame. if your door measures 32, go with 32. the material is okay quality. feels a bit light weight than to my liking but it works as intended. theres enough magnets on it that you dont have to go back to make sure they all connect after going in-out. if this review was useful, please click yes below :)
customer_reviews.author: Kevin N

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice screen
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that the shipper is excellent to work with. My application (door frame) was a little different and I needed a wider unit. Had it within 2 days no questions asked. Took 10 min to install, the pins they provided worked much better than I expected and I was even able to gently hammer them in tightly. The screen fits very nicely and seems to close easily. I do not say I love many products at Amazon but, I am very, very happy with this one
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: Best Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in November 2018 and it's still holding up great! I have kids running in and out all day so I just leave the sliding glass door open and they come and go as they please. The magnets are great and it self closes every time. I've had toddlers hanging from it (which I would not recommend) but it stayed up without any problems. My husband was annoyed when I bought it because he thought I was wasting money but now he praises it. It's been such a great value in our daily lives!
customer_reviews.author: Niknak

customer_reviews.title: High quality fiberglass mesh screen
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. This is my 2nd magnetic curtain. The first I had was the typical black striped mesh that you see everywhere. But the size didn't quite fit my door and it never stayed shut. The only screen that fit our frame was this brand, and it only came in the heavy duty fiberglass mesh, a grey color. I was hesitant because it's not the typical material you see, and because I need it to withstand 3 young boys. After installing the screen, I prefer the fiberglass one. It's thick and durable, thicker than a window screen. And I notice it less than the black striped ones, which seem cheaper in quality now. Oh, and it fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and magnets work great
customer_reviews.text: The thing I noticed was how light weight this screen is. Installing it can be tricky or not, it really depends on your existing door and opening. It didn't fit my french door because there was nothing to attach to, so I had to add a frame. The magnets work great, I can literally walk into and through the split and it closes up automatically behind me. I just hope its durable and lasts a long time. Time will tell. I'd recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Love this screen
customer_reviews.text: Love this screen. Mangetic closure is very strong. Only thing... Velcro is too strong. Easier to leave up all year. Sticky part is okay...so I staple gun it to door frame. Using it on back door. No more unwanted flies. It's perfect solution. Bought one for my mom...
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Several people commented on how much they liked it and wanted one to get one or replace ...
customer_reviews.text: Got some real use out of this over the 4th of July holiday. Make sure you measure correctly, I would say measure your exterior width and add 2 inches, measure your exterior height and add 1-2 inches. The magnets are plentiful so the seam sticks well and there or no gaps. Several people commented on how much they liked it and wanted one to get one or replace an existing one. Will update if there are any quality concerns in the future.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tam

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT - GOOD LUCK WITH THE FIT
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Works well. Unfortunately our door is in-between their standard lengths, so we have a gap at the bottom. But the quality seems good and magnets work very well. Flies and bugs reduced 90%. The dog got used to it fast, too. CONS: The push pins are poor quality (one snapped off and hurt my thumb) and their heads are too thick so they keep the Velcro apart) - I'm relying on the sticky back on the Velcro. Seems strong, so fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: One of the best screens
customer_reviews.text: We've had a bunch of magnetic screens on the backyard door to allow my dogs to go in and out without having to open and close the door, but previous screens have been pretty easy to detach and start tearing from the bottom part of the screen, since that's where my dogs push from. This one has been withstanding the 80lb and 90lb dog pushes on a daily without detaching from the velcro. The bottom part seems like it's made with higher quality raw material, so we'll see how long this one lasts...i'll come back and adjust it if it doesn't last more than 2 months, avg lifetime of my screens, RIP.
customer_reviews.author: Ian-b

customer_reviews.title: Great screen door
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 dogs, 3 of them over 100 lbs, this is the second season I have used this screen and it’s still in great shape. Sent one to my brother too.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Facemire

customer_reviews.title: Price is very good for this good quality screen
customer_reviews.text: Flies were always coming in my kitchen door that leads to the garden. The door needs to be kept open often to allow free air circulation. My daughter bought this screen and recommended it to me. She’s right! It is easy to install and when I go in and out the screen automatically closes behind me leaving out the flies. Very good value and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JenG

customer_reviews.title: Breezy
customer_reviews.text: I was a lil skeptical about this at first but not anymore! It's super easy. When the weather's nice and breezy,, we keep the door open all day without any concerns of bugs. Even on really windy days the magnets hold it shut. My 55+lb dog loves being able to easily go through it as well. We've had it up for a year+ now and still holding strong with no signs of losing adhesion or magnetic-ness. Our dog will even zoom through it. Only thing is if you have a metal door or threshold, the magnet may try to stick to it. But that's not a big deal at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Well made, could use stronger magnets.
customer_reviews.text: This product is well constructed and works as advertised. The Velcro comes in a roll so it attaches all the way around and can be pinned to siding. Which is great. However, one thing to note, if it's a concern for you, is the magnets aren't super strong, since the material is a bit stiffer than traditional nylon, the magnets being a bit stronger would be helpful. Other similar products I've used have had an easier time closing automatically.
customer_reviews.author: B. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a different brand screen last year and it was flimsy and didn't close well.This screen is fabulous!! it's easy to put up; has adhesion ALL the way around the perimeter, not just in spots. And the magnets attract one another very well. I'm SOOOO happy with this. And it's easy for my two cats to get out. They learn quickly how to push the middle. Now they can come and go and I don't get flies in! Buy this, you will NOT regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen  Wright

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!  Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this after the first few flies got in the house this spring. No flies in the house after installing. Very happy. Very easy to install. Seems very durable for the price. Exactly what we wanted. We started out getting an estimate over the winter for a professionally installed screen door, but that was $1200. Nope. Not going to pay that much. Very happy we went with this inexpensive DIY item. It is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Update 04/10/19 Adhesive is adequate but not if you have little ones and get frequent usage, I would suggest using included pins. I had mine installed against brick wall with smooth surface on both side but top roughed up which caused adhesive not to adhere too well. Still satisfied with our purchase. I was able to follow instruction and installed within fifteen (15) minutes. Open and close with no problem so far, in use about five days. Now, I did order it a bit too short so I contacted seller who gave me topnotch customer service.
customer_reviews.author: GATESYSTECH

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: So our door was actually 33 1/4" wide, but I took a gamble and decided to try this out anyways. Didn't fit the door frame exactly, but I knew this going into it. I put the Velcro on the very inner most part of the frame, and used the included thumb tacks to secure into place. I've run in and out probably over a hundred times already. Our 6 lb puppy has run through it probably 500 times and it still just as secure as when I put it up. Highly recommend. The magnets are perfect and it always secures itself after someone has run through it. Easy to get in and out with plates or dishes of food.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Choose this one!
customer_reviews.text: The durability is amazing. I have a dog that can open my slider. He weighs about 75lbs. He has repeatedly tried to grab the door handle through the screen and it has not torn. I just rub it between my fingers and everything realligns. The velcro at the top of the door has started to pull down a bit and isn't sticking in spots. I bought the As seen on TV version and it was torn the second day to the point that it didn't keep bugs out. I also have the plastic winter one from this company and it works great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations!!
customer_reviews.text: We tried another model first and it was awful. I bought this one and was AMAZED by how well it worked. It sticks to the door well. We have a 4 year old and a big puppy and they both navigate it well. It closes perfectly every time. Note: We do have a metal door so if someone is vigorous enough coming in, the magnets will stick to the metal door but I think that just shows the power of the magnets. We are so happy with the quality, how easy it was to install and how great it works so far!
customer_reviews.author: gamer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: If you need a screen this one is it ! I have tried others and they just don't hold up as well. The magnetic strip in this one is stronger and the screen itself is better. This is the 2nd one that I have ordered. The 1st one is still doing great ! We have had it over a year and we have it on our front door and our pups go in and out alot and the magnet and screen are still doing great !
customer_reviews.author: Anita T.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and has been hanging nicely for 2 months with no sign of falling. Our dogs learned to go in and out by pushing their nose through very quickly with basically no training and it closes 95% of the way behind them (the only reason I considered it being 4 stars, but if the magnets were any stronger, the dogs probably wouldn’t get through on their own). It always closes all the way when going outside, but the bottom doesn’t quite close when coming inside. Still totally worth it and way better than the sliding screen door that had previously been there, until the dogs broke through it. 0:)
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: It lasted little over a year
customer_reviews.text: I have this on our patio which is exposed to the elements. It has good adhesion and the magnets were strong. Over a period of a year the material around the magnets started coming apart and now its completely useless (15 months life).
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase! The adhesion is super sticky! Adhered to the stucco with no problem. I even removed it and reinstalled and it's still holding up well. Magnets are strong! Just don't over stretch when installing, make sure to leave slack so magnets can seal correctly. Only minor issue is the length, when you enter back inside it gets caught, shown in the photo. Not a big deal at all. The pros outweigh the con. My dog easily goes in and out. The ease of exiting and entering with your hands full of BBQ is fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Dana T.

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfectly and works as described
customer_reviews.text: The product fit and works exactly as described. As I was attaching the Velcro tape to the screen and after the first cut, I was like "Oh I should have made sure there was enough tape". I threw caution to the wind and continued to attach and cut so that every inch of Velcro was covered on the screen. At the end, there was almost 2 inches of Velcro tape left over. Overall, the entire install process took less than 10 minutes and the magnets snap into place as expected. Great product and would would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: C7Vette-Z51

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, it does come with pushpins so I used about 10 and still had some left. The pins are black so it's not visible if you use it. I used the pushpins because I have a dog that loves to go in and out of the house so I want to make sure it stays up. The parts that don't have the pins it does seems that the tape does hold but again I have used about 10 pins so this might be doing the trick too.
customer_reviews.author: krla killa

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep flies out when you have dogs and don't want to install a doggie door.
customer_reviews.text: These are really a great solution for a summer without flies. My dogs like to run in and out the sliding glass door and this keeps the bugs out. This is a replacement for one I bought before that lasted for 3 years.....after 3 years the dogs finally jumped and clawed it so many times it finally started to give way. The strips hold it really well and it was easy to install.....just needed scissors to cut the tape to size.
customer_reviews.author: Ardith L. Mardock

customer_reviews.title: Loving My Sturdy Magnet Streen
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely a good purchase! It's easy to assemble and the adhesive strip is very sturdy. I have a Romeo and Juliet balcony and this fit perfectly in my doorway. I ordered the 36" by 82" screen and it's a tad bit too long, but I made it work and the magnets still connect at the bottom so no bugs or flies can come through. The screen itself is also very sturdy and not flimsy in any way. I'm so pleased with this purchase. Highly recommended. Watch my video to see how it looks...
customer_reviews.author: Shena

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these beauties after having had one at another residence - they work SO WELL. Hubs attached with screws so they'd stay in place better, and though I prefer a screen door, these work well for where we have them. Bugs stay out, cooler air comes in. The magnets that close together are strong enough that they close very quickly, which is a good thing here in bug country!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly high quality!
customer_reviews.text: This was really easy to install and seems to be holding up very well with frequent use (daily use of multiple people for the past 3 months). The magnet is pretty strong and seals up quickly behind you, on occasion when the wind is strong it blows out of place but its overall great coverage to keep the bugs out! The sizing was perfect based on their guide (order door size and it comes a few inches bigger to fit for installation). We love it and have recommended it others!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby P.

customer_reviews.title: One fit well. The other was way off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2. The 48 version was actually close to 48 inches wide maybe 50. It worked out OK and I’m happy with it. The 36 inch version however was more like 42 and did not work. I have cement around the outside of my wooden door so there was nothing for the tacks or Velcro to hold onto. I needed a perfect 36 inch for this to work. A little disappointed the measurement was wrong. Packaging said 46x80 as well.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative screen
customer_reviews.text: process to install was pretty easy. There was not a screen to fit my door, so I had to alter the width and length. This made the process much more difficult. After I had sewn it down to the correct size and cut off extra length, it was easy to install and seems to work well. As my door is short and narrow, it does constrict the opening a bit, but we think its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Foodmaven

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Investment!
customer_reviews.text: I have two big dogs so I use this as a “doggy door”. I have bought multiple (cheaper) magnet screen doors in the past, but they would rip off the door frame and rip at the bottom with a misstep of a dog paw. As soon as I received this item, I could tell it was MUCH better quality (probably because of the fiberglass mesh). The adhesion is also so much better - half of the Velcro is built into the product, so no worries about it coming off on that end. All in all, I wasn’t too sure about the price tag since I knew cheaper options were available, but I’m so glad I made the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Edna Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality screen. But pay attention when they tell you to mount it higher in the middle at the top. I thought I did it right, but apparently it wasn't enough because it won't close automatically. No big deal, but I should have angled it better. The adhesive is super strong, so to avoid any chance of wall paint damage when I want to remove it, I first put painter's tape around the door frame and then adhered the screen on top. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: ingenious design for screen door
customer_reviews.text: Likes: pretty easy to install (I was able to install by myself); seems to hold up well after a few months (with adhesion and tacks); easy to go in and out without worrying about manually closing the screen door behind you Other things to note: adhesive good for initial install but tacks probably needed for long term hold; install on outside if door opens inward and install on inside if for opens outward
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: It'll probably be better on wider doors
customer_reviews.text: It'll probably be better on wider doors. I feel like I have to squeeze through it sideways since it doesn't open freely at the top. It is pretty good for keeping flys to a minimum Doesn't stop them all but pretty good. Of course, crawling bugs can still enter at the bottom if that is a concern. It is pretty good for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Lens F.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: We live in a trailer with no screen doors, but I love having the windows and doors open on nice days. This is so perfect for the back door. Our cats can easily go in and out without driving me nuts and it keeps all the bugs out! (I did have to show them how it worked a few times. lol) Very easy to install. Took me less than 10 minutes by myself. We will be buying another one soon for our front door.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Jamon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Every Fall, we put a screen up on our apartment door to let the fresh air in. The previous screens from other companies have never survived into Spring. THIS screen is far more sturdy, with magnetic strips sewn into the seams, reinforced stitching, and actual metallic screen fabric. This allows for in and out access without ripping, good visibility but enough privacy, and good air flow. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bug stopper
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to keep my door open without a bunch of flies or other insects coming in. The dog learned how to get through it easily so she isn't afraid to go in and out which is a plus for us. However our cats were just as smart and we usually keep them inside. But the main purpose was to keep bugs out! If you think it will keep pets in, I guess it depends on your pet.
customer_reviews.author: First Time Mom

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is a flimsy product with crap adhesive. It literally stood for maybe a week. The magnet was not aligning well after a very short time. Take your money and burn it instead of wasting it on this product. Terrible customer service that does not respond back to help with their crappy product.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about these screens. Bought two for two separate areas of home. They are super easy to install (recommend two sets of hands for extra help since doorways are so high). Magnets are super strong. Swings back together all by itself - immediately. Not one issue. Have used during two severe rain/thunder storms with no problems. Great breeze...NO flies!!! Couldn't ask for more - and, if I needed more, I would buy them in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: a2d2b

customer_reviews.title: Item as Described
customer_reviews.text: Just installed. I have my droughts about the stick on Velcro. Pins will help but I think the stick on Velcro will just pull my paint off. I only need it to last the season, I live 900 ft from the Atlantic Ocean and nothing ever last more than one season. I do like the fact the center closer is magnetic from top to bottom. I will update at the end of the season if it does't last. So far so good !
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: I bought 5 different ones; this is the best
customer_reviews.text: I have been through or tried 5 of these types of screens the past 5 years. The soft part of the velcro doesn't last very long, so you do have to replace them eventually. This brand seems to be better than the other ones I have bought. Better weight at the bottom, better distribution of magnets in the center, smaller holes to look more invisible than other brands at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Screen worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Both screens had different packaging I think because they were different sizes. One indicated more information than the other. However both screens seem to have come with the latches on the outside of the screen instead of the inside of the screen. 🤔 I've emailed the company but have not received a response. As far as the quality is concerned top notch! Magnets really do the trick but the breezy weather we are having now the screens to open up 😬🤔
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and it actually works.
customer_reviews.text: Even our dogs figured out how to use this magnetic screen door. It's the only one I've ever seen that actually worked. I installed it in 10 minutes or so, magnets are strong, it has enough weight to not blow open in the Wind and I'm no running around the house catching damselflies and putting them back outside because all life is precious. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle and Tony

customer_reviews.title: A++++++ buy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this screen!!!!! So perfect for anybody that lives in a apartment. I'm upstairs, and i also have a dog gate by the stairs so hes not able to run down them. My dog loves being able to just go sit outside on our patio 👍🏾👍🏾. Would definitely recommend this product!!!! Oh and the magnetic strips work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Gainz

customer_reviews.title: Better constructed,  from heavier gauge material than competing products I have used previously
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Feel and durability of the mesh fabric Magnet closures work fine. I like the fact that the product comes in various sizes...but I wish that there were even more size varieties offered. Cons: More pricey than some others, but probably worth it given the better fabric and stitching. I would probably buy again this product.
customer_reviews.author: John from Richmond

customer_reviews.title: SUPER easy to install and very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad we got this. It keeps the bugs at bag while allowed our two big dogs to race in and out of the house at will. The adhesive isn't going to be enough to hold it longterm, so you definitely want to use the tacks. Otherwise, it's fabulous, fits perfectly, and closes quickly behind the pups. Make sure you elevate the top middle just a wee bit when installing; doing so will ensure the magnets find each other more quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mistress Eva

customer_reviews.title: Wow, lasting a long time!
customer_reviews.text: So, we have purchased the cheap ones. They broke in a few months, and the magnets sucked. This one is awesome. If you have no pets, this will be great for a long time. We have pets, and they do tend to destroy things, especially doors. So, the fact that this is still up, and still working is kids amazing. I can’t recommend this enough. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: DHB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had several different types of magnetic screens. This has been the best thus far. There are magnets all the way down the closure surrounded by a thick fabric closure. The screen comes together flawlessly. It is as thick as one of my better screens so it should last for a couple years or more at least. Also we did not use the adhesive just the pushpins.
customer_reviews.author: Howe

customer_reviews.title: Great product - would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My door opens out to the balcony, and I wanted to take advantage of the breeze but not have bugs or anything flying in so easily. I have a very tall door, but this fit perfectly with no need to hem and was very easy to install with the provided Velcro tape. Feels very durable and the magnets catch pretty quickly to reclose. I’m very happy with how this turned out!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best set of screens I have ever purchased!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best set of screens I have ever purchased!!! I wish I could give it 10 stars I have purchased numerous screens like this in the past and this is by far the best one I have ever purchased. The Velcro on the screen side is sewn into the product , Other manufactures are not, they just stick on and always fall off. I am ordering another set to have on hand!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy marshall

customer_reviews.title: We love it, as does our boxer
customer_reviews.text: The screen door is perfect. Our boxer loves running through it, and it is so nice to leave the door open. The material is strong and yet very flexible. The magents are strong and it snaps back every time. The one recommendation I have is to double check how high you hang it. I hung mine at the top of the door frame, and it is almost an inch too high. It is just enough that a bug was able to fly under it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s really wonderful and meets our needs. I was concerned at the beginning it will block the view but it really dies t. I feel now more comfortable leaving the door open without the concern of mosquitoes, flies or bugs. The cat and the dog had already gotten used to it. The only con is that it doesn’t really fit the length of the door, there are about 2-3 inch missing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Na’ama Devivo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This item makes your door/house look extremely cheap from the outside. When I hung this up, it did not close 'automatically' and I would need to adjust it so to not leave holes/gaps that let bugs in. It also did not stay flush to the door and left a large gap at the bottom. Easy return and got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! Wonderful!! An answer to my problems!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been used other screens before and, this is the best one I have ever had!! My dogs tore up the “magic mesh” within 3 days. Also, the “magic mesh” leaves gaps and it’s clacks together. Real noisy! This one closes all the way and is silent as you go through it!! I love it! My dogs love it! Will be buying more for the other doors!!
customer_reviews.author: Bel Banks

customer_reviews.title: Airy look, even in black.  Easy to install. Measure thrice!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement screen for a darker, heavier one. I like this one because more light can enter through the net. Had to fold and sew over the top on a curtain rod cuz i measured wrong. So far, the screen is sticking well to the jamb. I didnt use the enclosed pins. Sometimes the magnets that close the flap stick to my metal door, but overall, im pleased with the look and functionality. My dog rushes through and no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: kinob

customer_reviews.title: Great simple sturdy solution!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to install and great quick solution to add a screen. I added this for a backdoor to the yard and thankfully is keeping flies out! The magnets are strong enough to hold the screen closed securely and the velcro tape was enough for the perimeter of the door and provide a strong seal. We'll see how it holds up but it looks good. I'd highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Winter baby

customer_reviews.title: amazing product and works great!!
customer_reviews.text: this is my 2nd curtain door... the earlier one didn't worked well. after a long research, got this one and it was very easy for the pets and kids to run through.. installation worked great and adhesion is perfect.. but durability.. is less... in few spots the mesh was torn less than a month of use... by kids or pets.. no idea.. just that one thing stops me from giving a 5...
customer_reviews.author: Vathan

customer_reviews.title: idea on hanging
customer_reviews.text: Greetings, I bought a size for a taller door than was minimally required to fit the door opening. I hung the screen top 8 inches ABOVE the top frame of the doorway. This allows the screen to open wider for a bigger opening when passing through the screen. I found on previous screens using the adhesive/velcro on the frame gave a narrow (inconvenient) opening to pass through. I used a 1"x2" board, cut to length and screwed to the house siding, and attached the screen to the 1x2.
customer_reviews.author: whut the heck

customer_reviews.title: Better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: I bought another brand and the MAGZO was better. It has velcro all around and came with tacks. When I tried to install the other brand, the self adhesive Velcro was no longer sticky (so I have to buy my own). I appreciated how it came in the extra long length because my door is extra long. I watched a YouTube video to show how to pin it if your door is not as wide. The bottom does a good job at staying together. Hopefully it'll do well when it's windy.
customer_reviews.author: DOK

product_meta.title: MAGZO Magnetic Screen Door 36 x 98, Reinforced Fiberglass Mesh Curtain Entry Door Mesh with Full Frame Hook&Loop Fits Door Size up to 36"x98" Max-Grey
feature_bullets: MAGNETIC SCREEN DOOR SIZE – Screen door size: 38 x 99 inch--Fit door size: 36 x 98 inch.【HOW TO CHOOSE A SUITABLE SIZE: Before purchase, please carefully measure your door size and order that size (ONLY door size, doesn't include door frame part )】

UNIQUE HOOK AND LOOP HASP DESIGN - We are the only seller with windproof sticker hasp design on the middle and bottom of the screen door curtain, after many tests about wind resistance level, windproof sticker hasp can effectively consolidate and prevent the magnet screen door from being blown open by the wind. Excellent workmanship guarantees the screen door lasts a long life.

PET FRIENDLY SCREEN MESH - Lets your pets freely go in/out/keeps sealed, your lovely pets could push their way in and out of mesh screen whenever they want, and close up right after they go through it，save your time to get up and down to let pets out everytime.

TAKE MINUTES TO ASSEMBLE AND DETACHABLE - Truly Ready to Stick right on and go. Come with an installation manual helps you install like a breeze! Remove easily and you can rolled it up during the off seasons. Screen mesh door with strong magnets go all the way down the entire middle from top to bottom, sturdy adhesive strip with extra push pins to secure.

ECONOMICAL CHOICE - Compared to the previous nylon screen doors mesh with magnets, fiberglass material with better durability, through high temperature molding, fireproof, chemical corrosion resistance, good shape. A good replacement for An actual door, much economical choice for you!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,257 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
